Name: Tirana
Description: Tirana is the capital and largest city of Albania, known for its historical significance and vibrant cultural scene.

Name: Shkodër
Description: Shkodër is located in the northern part of Albania, known for its rich history, cultural heritage, and proximity to Lake Shkodra.

Name: Vlorë
Description: Vlorë is a coastal city in southern Albania, known for its historical significance and its beautiful beaches along the Ionian Sea.

Name: Durres
Description: Durres is one of Albania s major port cities on the Adriatic coast, known for its ancient ruins and vibrant waterfront.

Name: Elbasan
Description: Elbasan is an inland city in central Albania, known for its historical landmarks and its role in the region s industrial activities.

Name: Fier
Description: Fier is located in southern Albania, famous for its agricultural output, including oil and natural gas extraction.

Name: Korce
Description: Korce is a city in the southeastern part of Albania, known for its cultural life, historical sites, and proximity to the Greek border.

Name: Berat
Description: Berat is a UNESCO World Heritage city known for its well-preserved Ottoman architecture and its scenic location on the Osum River.

Name: Gjirokaster
Description: Gjirokastër is a historic city in southern Albania, known for its old Ottoman-style houses and a UNESCO World Heritage site.

Name: Kukes
Description: Kukes is located in the northeastern part of Albania, known for its mountainous landscape and natural beauty.
